00019 #include "LineSegmentsMobilityBase.h"
00020 
00021 #include <FWMath.h>
00022 
00023 
00024 void LineSegmentsMobilityBase::beginNextMove(cMessage *msg)
00025 {
00026     EV << "beginNextMove, startPos: " << move.startPos.info() << " stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info() << " targetPos: " 
00027        << targetPos.info() << endl << "simTime: " << simTime() << " targetTime: " << targetTime << endl;;
00028 
00029     // go to exact position where previous statement was supposed to finish
00030     move.startPos = targetPos;
00031     stepTarget = targetPos;
00032     simtime_t now = targetTime;
00033 
00034     // choose new targetTime and targetPos
00035     setTargetPosition();
00036 
00037 
00038     EV << "startPos: " << move.startPos.info() << " targetPos: " << targetPos.info() << endl;
00039 
00040     if (targetTime<now)
00041         error("LineSegmentsMobilityBase: targetTime<now was set in %s's beginNextMove()", getClassName());
00042 
00043     if( move.speed <= 0 ){
00044         // end of movement
00045         stepSize.setX(0);
00046         stepSize.setY(0);
00047   EV << "speed < 0; stop moving!\n";
00048         delete msg;
00049     }
00050     else if (targetPos==move.startPos){
00051         // no movement, just wait
00052   EV << "warning, we are not moving!\n";
00053         stepSize.setX(0);
00054         stepSize.setY(0);
00055         scheduleAt(std::max(targetTime,simTime()), msg);
00056     }
00057     else{
00058         // keep moving
00059         double numIntervals = (targetTime-now) / updateInterval;
00060         // int numSteps = floor(numIntervals); -- currently unused,
00061         // although we could use step counting instead of comparing
00062         // simTime() to targetTime each step.
00063 
00064         // Note: step = speed*updateInterval = distance/time*updateInterval =
00065         //        = (targetPos-pos) / (targetTime-now) * updateInterval =
00066         //        = (targetPos-pos) / numIntervals
00067         stepSize = (targetPos - move.startPos);
00068 
00069   move.setDirection( targetPos );
00070 
00071   move.startTime = simTime();
00072 
00073   stepSize = stepSize / numIntervals;
00074   stepTarget += stepSize;
00075 
00076   move.speed = move.startPos.distance( targetPos ) / (targetTime - now );
00077 
00078   EV << "numIntervals: " << numIntervals << " now: " << now << " simTime " << simTime() << " stepTarget: " 
00079      << stepTarget.info() << " speed: " << move.speed << endl; 
00080 
00081         scheduleAt(simTime() + updateInterval, msg);
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void LineSegmentsMobilityBase::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg)
00086 {
00087     if( move.speed <= 0 ){
00088         delete msg;
00089         return;
00090     }
00091     else if (simTime()+updateInterval >= targetTime){
00092         beginNextMove(msg);
00093     }
00094     else{
00095   EV << "make next step\n";
00096 
00097         scheduleAt(simTime() + updateInterval, msg);
00098 
00099   // update position
00100   move.startPos = stepTarget;
00101   stepTarget += stepSize;
00102   move.startTime = simTime();
00103     }
00104 
00105     // do something if we reach the wall
00106     fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00107 
00108     updatePosition();
00109 }
